overview: The most beautiful castle in the world and its revealed secrets... The filmmakers had the opportunity for one year to watch what was happening around, but also inside Versailles. These include beautiful gardens. Sixteen thousand flowers to plant. For example, nine people take care of the Fountain Festival. Ponds and fountains fill with water, gushing to the rhythm of classical music. Every year at the same time, just before the beds are weeded, the Trianon gardeners select the flowers that will decorate the gardens for the next season. At the same time, it is just a drop in the sea of ​​work at the Palace of Versailles. (Czech television)
title: 4 Seasons at Versailles
